version_description:
WINTER EVENT (November 30th)
Frosty the Snowman is back! He brings with him new quests for the winter season. Complete them, collect stars and open presents, such as Forge Points, blueprints and nine brand new winter village buildings!
OCEANIC FUTURE - PART V (December 4th)
Oceans are way bigger than we anticipated! Sail farther and dive even deeper to unveil its all mysteries!
3D TOUCH SUPPORT
If you own a device that supports 3D Touch, you can now enter the build mode by simply pressing on a building of your choice. Otherwise, you can long-touch for the same effect.
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

IMPROVED INVENTORY SORTING
Kits, buildings and items are now sorted close to one another, making it easier for you to find what you're looking for.

MOTIVATION KIT IMPROVEMENTS
Motivation Kits are now Self-Aid Kits. You can now polish/motivate any building, including decorations, culture buildings and even completed productions! The same changes apply to Mass Motivation Kits.

BUGFIXES
We solved a few issues with the game.

We are giving you more control over your data, and the way it is used. If you wish to review and adjust your data management settings, you can easily do this from the account settings.
Moreover, as always, we have also fixed a few bugs to make the game even more enjoyable!

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

We are giving you more control over your data, and the way it is used. If you wish to review and adjust your data management settings, you can easily do this from the account settings.
Moreover, as always, we have also fixed a few bugs to make the game even more enjoyable!

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

A new event coming to Forge of Empires! Soccer Cup will begin on June 14! Cheer for your city's team and help the coach lead them to victory by choosing the most efficient way of passing the ball!
Good luck on the pitch and thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

Lead your soccer team to victory in the Soccer Cup (until July 16) and rise in the League system to get awesome rewards!
We also made some nice changes to the game:
- The bonus of your Arc is now visible in the contribution rewards.
- You can now use a search field to find desired items in the inventory.
- Change worlds with ease without the need to log out and in again.
We also fixed a few bugs to make the game even more enjoyable!

A NEW ERA - VIRTUAL FUTURE
Over a hundred map sectors on a completely new world map, new buildings, technologies and much more! Welcome to the Virtual future!

SUMMER EVENT (from August 2nd)
Summer is here, and this year we visit the Forge Island to take part in the annual Summer festival! Take a spin on the mysterious ship - the 'Wheel of Fortune' - and see what rewards she has in store for you!

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

In this version we fixed a couple of bugs:
- Coins are now doubled for the Ship, Oasis and Caravansary if motivated.
- The Terracotta Army boost is not displayed anymore on unassigned units.
- A couple of visual bugs related to missing or wrong icons.

And some more!
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

In this version we fixed a couple of bugs:
- Coins are now doubled for the Ship, Oasis and Caravansary if motivated.
- The Terracotta Army boost is not displayed anymore on unassigned units.
- A couple of visual bugs related to missing or wrong icons.

And some more!
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

Fall Event (from September 12th on)
Welcome to the great Fall Bake Off! Collect all the necessary ingredients and bake as many recipes as possible to get awesome rewards!

This version also introduces several bugfixes and improvements for stability:
- The "new item" indicators in the inventory now support up to 99 items.
- Guild bar is now updated instantly, after joining a guild.
- Rogues are no longer transformed at the beginning of a replay.

FALL EVENT
The Great Fall Bake Off has begun! Collect all the necessary ingredients and bake as many recipes as possible to get awesome rewards!

OTHER
This version also introduces several bugfixes and improvements for stability:

- Collecting from buildings is now smooth and comfortable again.
- Small background improvements for the Reconstruction Mode's stability.
- The game could sometimes crash upon wining a negotiation. We solved it now.

GENGHIS KHAN HISTORICAL QUESTLINE (from October 10th)
Complete all quests to earn a powerful new building and get Genghis himself as a unique inhabitant for your city!

This version introduces also several bugfixes and improvements for stability. Among them:
- When switching worlds, the price and amount of expansions is displayed correctly again.
- Special residential buildings will now once again show the correct icon for their productions.

Our developers continue their work on some awesome and exciting new additions to the game! Keep your eyes open for more details soon.
- In preparation for our brand new feature, Guild Battlegrounds, we've raised the Guild level cap from 75 to 100!
- This update also includes various bugfixes and technical improvements to the game.
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

Summer Event 2019!
- Summer is here, return to the Forge Island to take part in the annual Summer festival! There are awesome prizes to be won, like the Crow's Nest which gives a chance of 20FP per day at level 8!
- This update also includes various bugfixes and technical improvements to the game.
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

The Great Fall Bake Off returns in the Fall Event 2019!

- Mix ingredients to bake delectable treats.
- Feast your eyes on tasty rewards like the brand-new September Cottage!
- Climb the leagues to become this year's Star Baker.

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

The Antiques Dealer has come to town (from July 29th)!
- Exchange your unwanted inventory items in for Trade Coins and Gemstones.
- Use Trade Coins and Gemstones to buy something new in the Antiques Dealer's shop!
- Use Trade Coins to win big in the Antiques Dealer's auctions.
- This update also includes various bugfixes and technical improvements to the game.
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

The Cherry Blossom Festival makes its return in this year's Spring Event. Collect Spring Lanterns to win the unique Pagoda with 3 choices at its final level!
This update also includes:
- Improvements to Reconstruction Mode. Now you can save your progress as a draft and come back to finish your work!
- Several smaller bugfixes and improvements.

Soccer Cup 2019 Continues!
- In this version, we have added a slider to to the sell screen when selling Great Buildings. This should help to differentiate selling a Great Building from selling regular or special buildings!
- This update also includes various bugfixes and technical improvements to the game.

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

Soccer Cup 2019!
- Help Coach Miller's team to victory in this year's Soccer Cup event, and be in with the chance to win some awesome new prizes!

We have also made some exciting changes to the Viking Cultural Settlements!

- Specifically, we increased the number of Fragment of Greater Runestone rewarded per settlement, we improved the stats for Yggdrasil, and we adjusted some of the rewards and requirements in the questline.

On the 23rd of May, the following packages will be adjusted in the in-game shop:

The amount of Diamonds in the following packages will be reduced:
600 Diamond package by 12%
1500 Diamond package by 17%
5000 Diamond package by 20%

We understand that changes like this are never popular, however they are necessary to ensure all the packages we offer remain balanced, and align with one another.

With this update, we have improved the Monk unit of the Virtual Future.

This update also includes some visual fixes for buildings and quests.

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

We have made some adjustments and improvements to the Cultural Settlements.

This update also includes some smaller fixes.

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

This version introduces improvements, like:

- Avatars are now sorted by the order they have been unlocked in.
- A warning has been added to the Store Building Item that details what changes are done when the building is stored.
- Rewards now always show the actual unit or building instead of a category such as "light unit".
- Special event buildings now require a checkmark confirmation when selling them.

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

HALLOWEEN EVENT (from October 23rd)
Solve all the quests given by the Librarian in our Halloween Event and receive haunted buildings and spooky new avatars!

FRAGMENTS IN DAILY CHALLENGES
Complete Daily Challenges and get the chance to win the new Fragments to assemble powerful buildings for your city!

We also fixed a couple of bugs and polished the game.

Thank you for playing Forge of Empires

On the 23rd of May, the following packages will be adjusted in the in-game shop:

The amount of Diamonds in the following packages will be reduced:
600 Diamond package by 12%
1500 Diamond package by 17%
5000 Diamond package by 20%

We understand that changes like this are never popular, however they are necessary to ensure all the packages we offer remain balanced, and align with one another.

The Archaeology event returns on May 5th!
- Complete quests to collect scrolls and explore the depths of the caves.
- Exchange scrolls in return for shovels, brushes and dynamite to clear out any obstacles in your path and uncover ancient treasures.

- Find clay tablets to unlock unique questlines for additional rewards.

In this update we've added some fantastic Guild Battlegrounds improvements:

The Great Fall Bake Off returns on September 10th in the Fall Event 2020!
- Mix ingredients to bake delectable treats.
- Feast your eyes on tasty rewards like the brand-new residential building: The Harvest Barn! Together with 6 different fields it forms the Harvest Farm Set.
- Have a chance to win the Cider Mill, the Mill of Fall and the September Cottage from previous years as well!
- Climb the leagues to become this year's Star Baker.

Our spooktacular Halloween Event will continue running until November 4th!

Top of the mornin' to ya! The St.Patrick's Day Event will return on February 18th, and Paddy McCharms needs your help once more!

The Archaeology event returns on April 29th!
- Complete quests to collect scrolls and explore the depths of the caves.
- Exchange scrolls in return for shovels, brushes and dynamite to clear out your path and uncover ancient treasures.
- Turn in golden idols to claim the grand prize and solidify your place in the archaeological history books!
- Find clay tablets to unlock questlines for additional rewards and collect gems to explore our new Reward Calendar!

Starting on July 13th, we will be introducing a completely new event to Forge of Empires - The Wildlife Event!
-Try our completely new Pop-2 mechanic!
-Match 5 (or more) blocks, and pop to create Reward Chests as well as drop them!
-Drop Pawprints to make progress toward the Grand Prize!
-Think ahead and maximize your moves, so you can get the most out of each level!
Thank you for playing Forge of Empires!

The Wildlife Event has begun on July 13th!
- Get entrance tickets by completing quests and collecting from incidents
- Tap 2+ adjacent blocks of the same color to pop them
- Create Reward Chests for popping 5+ of the same block and drop it to the bottom to grab it
- Collect pawprints to make progress towards the Grand Prize
- Unlock the Visitor's Center in your Event Hub as you complete event quests

We are happy to bring you the Community Sprint:
- From now on, your inventory search will be remembered, so the next time you open the inventory you don’t need to search again
- The existing 'Great Buildings' and 'Medals' tabs from the Global Ranking window are now available on mobile version as well
- We have added 'reply' and 'copy & paste' functions to the Message Center for more intuitive communication
